page.title: 17Shops in Voe.
page.content: Voe is served by two grocery shops. {TAGON STORES. This is a self_service shop and employs 9 people;4 full_time and 3 part_time.In 1977 the shop was extended.Video tapes can be hired and petrol is sold. {OPENING HOURS:}9.30am_1pm 2pm_6pm 2pm_6pm MON & SUN {T&M ADIES This shop was built in 1910.This is not a self_service shop.5 people are employed;2 full_time and 3 part_time.Apart from groceries this shop sells cresote,cement,sheep food, diesel and petrol.In the summer time when tourists visit Shetland,knitwear is sold upstairs in the shop. {OPENING HOURS:}8am_1pm 2pm_6pm 8am_1pm THURS CLOSED SUNDAY.
